Every Life Deserves Kindness

StarPaws UK is a dedicated animal welfare charity committed to rescuing, protecting, and advocating for the rights of vulnerable animals across the United Kingdom.

Get Involved Donate Now

Our Mission Statement

We aim to Rescue, Protect and Advocate for the rights of the most vulnerable animals in the UK, including homeless pets and injured wild animals.

Our Core Values

Compassion

We approach every animal with empathy and kindness, recognizing their inherent worth and right to a life free from suffering.

Responsibility

We take seriously our duty to care for animals in need and to be accountable to our supporters, volunteers, and the community.

Community

We believe in working together with local communities, other organizations, and volunteers to create lasting change for animals.

Trust

We build relationships based on honesty, transparency, and reliability with all our stakeholders, from donors to partner organizations.

Sustainability

We are committed to long-term solutions that create sustainable change for animal welfare and our environment.

Who We Are

StarPaws UK (S.P.U.) is a newly established animal welfare charity dedicated to protecting homeless animals and vulnerable wild animals. Our current main activity area is in northern England, UK.

Founded on the belief that every life deserves kindness, we work tirelessly to provide shelter, medical care, and rehabilitation for animals in need. Our team of dedicated volunteers and professionals are committed to making a difference in the lives of animals across the UK.

From rescuing abandoned pets to rehabilitating injured wildlife, our work spans across communities, creating safe havens and advocating for better animal welfare policies.

Contact Us

Every Life Deserves Kindness

This simple yet powerful belief guides everything we do at StarPaws UK. Whether it's a stray cat, an injured bird, or an abandoned dog, we believe that every animal deserves compassion, care, and a chance at a better life.
